version_description:
We added lots of treats for Valentine's Day:

● New mood on the start screen
● Cozier setting in the salon: The default radio song is now a slow dance tune, and the room is decked out in Valentine's balloons and curtains
● New clothes and accessories like glasses, hats and scarves
● New backgrounds in the photo station

Not feeling all lovey-dovey? You can change the radio station to uptempo music and opt for everyday clothes and accessories.

Valentine's Day is over — update the app to blow out all cozy candles and pop the balloons! In this update we'll bring the original theme back.

Want to keep a few things? We thought so!
● All accessories & clothes will stay
● All the backgrounds in the photo station are saved

Love Toca Hair Salon 3 or have ideas for improvements? We'd love to hear from you! Contact us on YouTube, Instagram, Twitter or Facebook. We're @tocaboca.

Get ready to celebrate Valentine's Day in style with Toca Hair Salon 3. In this sweet app update, we've thrown in everything your characters need to get just the right look for a special day! Grab your tools and get styling!
Thanks for sharing your feedback and reporting bugs — we’ve made some updates. Get the latest version to have the best experience! And leave us a review — we read every one of them!
